title: Navaratna Kundan Haar: The Regal Statement
features: This exquisite Haaram features a magnificent central pendant crafted with time-honored Kundan setting techniques. The pendant showcases a captivating ruby surrounded by intricately placed Kundan stones. The multi-strand necklace is adorned with lustrous natural pearls and vibrant emerald beads, creating a harmonious blend of colors and textures. The design reflects the regal heritage of South Indian jewelry, making it a timeless heirloom. Delicate emerald drops add a touch of elegance and movement.
occasions: or any event where you want to make a statement.
description: Authentic Kundan craftsmanship ensures unmatched brilliance and durability. The use of natural pearls and genuine gemstones adds to the value and prestige of this piece. This Haaram is not just jewelry; it's a symbol of tradition, heritage, and enduring beauty. Its unique design blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary attire.
